anathema: Dismember a creature, desecrate a corpse, show ingratitude for a sincere gift
edict: Ensure the health of crops and vegetation, protect the bodies and souls of the worthy dead, avenge the wrongly murdered
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Osiris (Lord of the Living)](/Deities.aspx?ID=520)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 314

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Dead or Missing Deities](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=34)

**Edicts** Ensure the health of crops and vegetation, protect the bodies and souls of the worthy dead, avenge the wrongly murdered

**Anathema** Dismember a creature, desecrate a corpse, show ingratitude for a sincere gift

**Area of Concern**
Afterlife, fertility, rebirth, resurrection

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** must choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)

**Favored Weapon** [Flail](/Weapons.aspx?ID=374)

**Domains** [Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=102), [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=78), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85), [Soul](/Domains.aspx?ID=118)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=1678)

- **2nd**
[False Vitality](/Spells.aspx?ID=1523)

- **6th**
[Tangling Creepers](/Spells.aspx?ID=1714)

</column>
name: Osiris (Lord of the Living)
